mdRecord.dcterms:title: Standards of the National Board of Fire Underwriters for the Installation, Maintenance, and Use of First Aid Fire Appliances as recommended by the National Fire Protection Administration, c. 1948
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pamphlet written by the National Board of Fire Underwriters in 1948 about the NBFU's standards for the installation, maintenance, and use of first aid fire appliances.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
